reporter_caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF COLBY, 172 N.J. 37 (2002)

caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF MAXWELL X. COLBY, AN ATTORNEY AT LAW.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER The Disciplinary Review Board having filed with the Court its decision in DRB 01-030, concluding that MAXWELL X. COLBY of OAKHURST, who was admitted to the bar of this State in 1975, should be disciplined for violating RPC 1.15(a) (negligent misappropriation) and RPC 1.15(d) (failure to comply with recordkeeping rules), and good cause appearing;Page 38
It is ORDERED that MAXWELL X. COLBY is hereby reprimanded; and it is further
ORDERED that the entire record of this matter be made a permanent part of respondent's file as an attorney at law of this State; and it is further
ORDERED that respondent reimburse the Disciplinary Oversight Committee for appropriate administrative costs incurred in the prosecution of this matter.
